question:
Consider the following pairs:
  1. Surya Kiran-XI - joint military exercise between India and Nepal
  2. Al Nagah-II - joint military exercise between India and Oman
  3. MITRA SHAKTI 2016 - joint military exercise between India and Sri Lanka
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: “Surya Kiran-XI” is a joint military exercise between India and Nepal and it recently began in the Pithoragarh area of Uttarakhand. The Surya Kiran series of exercises are being conducted biannually, alternatively in India and Nepal. It is two-week long exercise that aims at training of both the troops in the area of various counter insurgency operations over a prolonged period. Al Nagah-Ii 2017 is the joint military exercise between India and Oman. The aim of this exercise is to acquaint both forces with each other’s operating procedures, improve the interoperability in conducting joint operations. Mitra Shakti series of bilateral exercises is one of the major bilateral defence cooperation initiatives between India and Sri Lanka since 2013.
